title: [Question] subjects from 3rd sem for placements
content: what are the subjects from 3rd sem cse required for placements(for a software developer role,sde),i've heard people say dsa is the most imp,are there any other subjects from 3rd sem that we need to dive in deep for placements exept dsa?

comments.body: Webtech if you are interested in mern
Not much important for placements, but if you are preparing for gate then very important
Depends on the role. A pure SWE role might not really need it but if you are in a role closer to the system then yes
okay so for a pure sde we dive deep into dsa and webtech?
DSA, projects, whatever interests you. I had 0 webtech on my resume when I applied.
